greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = T(n-1,k-1) + T(n-1,k) + 1 for 0<k<n, T(n,0) = T(n,n) = 1.
comment: Eigensequence of the triangle = A001861. - _Gary W. Adamson_, Apr 17 2009
T(n,k) = A014473(n,k) + A007318(n,k), 0 <= k <= n. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 10 2012
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n=0..150 of triangle, flattened
Index entries for triangles and arrays related to Pascal's triangle
formula: T(n, k) = 2*binomial(n,k) - 1. - David W. Cantrell (DWCantrell(AT)sigmaxi.net), Sep 30 2007
T(n, k) = Sum_{j=0..n-k} C(n-k,j)*C(k,j)*(2 - 0^j) for k <= n - _Paul Barry_, Apr 27 2006
program: (MAGMA) [2*Binomial(n,k) -1: k in [0..n], n in [0..12]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Mar 12 2020
(Sage) [[2*binomial(n,k) -1 for k in (0..n)] for n in (0..12)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Mar 12 2020
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 20 2005
